trans-unit.source: Specifies flags that describe the attributes of a field.
trans-unit.target: 指定描述欄位屬性的旗標。

trans-unit.source: `FieldAttributes` uses the value from `FieldAccessMask` to mask off only the parts of the attribute value that pertain to the accessibility.
trans-unit.target: `FieldAttributes` 使用來自值`FieldAccessMask`關閉部分屬性值的存取範圍相關的遮罩。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following code determines if `Attributes` has the public bit set.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列程式碼會決定如果`Attributes`已公開設定位元。

trans-unit.source: To get the `FieldAttributes`, first get the class `Type`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得`FieldAttributes`，先取得類別`Type`。

trans-unit.source: From the `Type`, get the `FieldInfo`.
trans-unit.target: 從`Type`，取得`FieldInfo`。

trans-unit.source: From the `FieldInfo`, get the `Attributes`.
trans-unit.target: 從`FieldInfo`，取得`Attributes`。

trans-unit.source: The enumerated value is a number representing the bitwise OR of the attributes implemented on the field.
trans-unit.target: 列舉的值是數字代表 欄位上實作之屬性的位元 OR。

trans-unit.source: In this example, three fields are built and the `FieldAttributes` values are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，建立三個欄位和`FieldAttributes`顯示值。

trans-unit.source: A `FieldAttributes` value can contain more than one attribute, for example, both `Public` and `Literal`, as shown in the third field.
trans-unit.target: A`FieldAttributes`值只能包含一個以上的屬性，例如，`Public`和`Literal`、 第三個欄位中所示。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the field is accessible throughout the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 指定在整個組件中欄位是可存取的。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the field is accessible only by subtypes in this assembly.
trans-unit.target: 指定欄位只能由這個組件中的子型別存取。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the field is accessible only by type and subtypes.
trans-unit.target: 指定欄位只能由型別和子型別存取。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the field is accessible by subtypes anywhere, as well as throughout this assembly.
trans-unit.target: 指定欄位可以在任何地方和整個組件中由子型別存取。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the access level of a given field.
trans-unit.target: 指定特定欄位的存取層級。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the field has a default value.
trans-unit.target: 指定此欄位含有預設值。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the field has marshaling information.
trans-unit.target: 指定欄位含有封送處理 (Marshaling) 資訊。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the field has a relative virtual address (RVA).
trans-unit.target: 指定欄位含有相對虛擬位址 (RVA)。

trans-unit.source: The RVA is the location of the method body in the current image, as an address relative to the start of the image file in which it is located.
trans-unit.target: RVA 為目前影像中方法主體的位置，就像相對於影像檔所在位置的開始位址。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the field is initialized only, and can be set only in the body of a constructor.
trans-unit.target: 指定欄位只初始化，而且只能在建構函式主體中設定。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the field's value is a compile-time (static or early bound) constant.
trans-unit.target: 指定欄位的值為編譯時期常數 (靜態或早期繫結)，

trans-unit.source: Any attempt to set it throws a <see cref="T:System.FieldAccessException" />.
trans-unit.target: 任何對其進行設定的嘗試都會擲回 <see cref="T:System.FieldAccessException" />。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the field does not have to be serialized when the type is remoted.
trans-unit.target: 指定當型別為遠端時，欄位不必序列化。

trans-unit.source: Reserved for future use.
trans-unit.target: 保留供未來使用。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the field is accessible only by the parent type.
trans-unit.target: 指定欄位只能由父型別存取。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the field cannot be referenced.
trans-unit.target: 指定無法參考此欄位。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the field is accessible by any member for whom this scope is visible.
trans-unit.target: 指定欄位可以讓能見到這個範圍的任何成員存取。

trans-unit.source: Reserved.
trans-unit.target: 保留的。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the common language runtime (metadata internal APIs) should check the name encoding.
trans-unit.target: 指定 Common Language Runtime (中繼資料內部 API) 應檢查名稱編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a special method, with the name describing how the method is special.
trans-unit.target: 指定特殊方法，具有描述方法是如何特殊的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the field represents the defined type, or else it is per-instance.
trans-unit.target: 指定表示定義型別的欄位，不然它就是一個執行個體。
